name: Gas Lipstick
description: '''Mika Kristian Karppinen''' (born 8 February 1971), better known as '''Gas Lipstick''', is a Swedish-Finnish musician, best known as the previous drummer of the Finnish [[gothic rock]] band [[HIM (Finnish band)|HIM]]. He is also a drummer for other bands currently on hiatus, such as [[deathgrind]] group To Separate the Flesh from the Bones, [[heavy metal music|heavy metal]] group Bendover, [[punk rock|punk]] group Valvontakomissio, and punk group Ääritila.
